flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: SPHEAL is much faster rolling than nwalking to get around. When groups ofnthis POKéMON eat, they all clap at oncefto show their pleasure. Because of this,ntheir mealtimes are noisy.
SPHEAL always travels by rollingnaround on its ball-like body. When thenseason for ice floes arrives, thisfPOKéMON can be seen rolling about onnice and crossing the sea.
It is completely covered with plushy fur.nAs a result, it never feels the cold evennwhen it is rolling about on ice floes orndiving in the sea.
Its body is covered in fluffy fur. Thenfur keeps it from feeling cold whilenit is rolling on ice.
Its body is covered in fluffy fur.nThe fur keeps it from feeling cold whilenit is rolling on ice.
It rolls across ice floes to reachnshore because its body is poorlynshaped for swimming.
It rolls across ice floes to reachnshore because its body is poorlynshaped for swimming.
It rolls across ice floes to reachnshore because its body is poorlynshaped for swimming.
It crosses the oceans by rolling itselfnon drifting ice. Fluffy fur keeps it warmnwhen the temperature is below freezing.
It crosses the oceans by rolling itselfnon drifting ice. Fluffy fur keeps it warmnwhen the temperature is below freezing.
Il gagne la côte en roulant sur lesnblocs de glace car sa morphologienn’est pas adaptée à la nage.
It rolls across ice floes to reachnshore because its body is poorlynshaped for swimming.
Il gagne la côte en roulant sur lesnblocs de glace car sa morphologienn’est pas adaptée à la nage.
It rolls across ice floes to reachnshore because its body is poorlynshaped for swimming.
They can’t swim well yet,nand they move much faster by rolling.nWhen they’re happy, they clap fins.
They can’t swim well yet,nand they move much faster by rolling.nWhen they’re happy, they clap fins.
まだ　じょうずに　およげずnころがったほうが　はやく　うごける。nうれしいと　みんなで　てをたたく。
아직 능숙하게 헤엄치지 못하고n구르는 쪽이 빨리 움직일 수 있다.n기쁘면 다 같이 손뼉을 친다.
Il se déplace en roulant, car il n’est pas doué pournla nage. Quand il est heureux, il applaudit avec sesnnageoires.
Es ist noch kein guter Schwimmer und bewegt sichnrollend schneller fort. Ist es froh, klatscht es mitnseinen Flossen.
Como no saben nadar muy bien, se muevennrápidamente rodando. Cuando están alegres, dannpalmadas con las aletas.
Non sa ancora nuotare molto bene e si muove piùnvelocemente rotolando. Quando è felice batte lenpinne.
They can’t swim well yet, and they move muchnfaster by rolling. When they’re happy, theynclap fins.
まだ　上手に　泳げずn転がったほうが　速く　動ける。nうれしいと　みんなで　手をたたく。
フサフサの　たいもうで　からだがnおおわれて　いるので　こおりのnうえを　ころがっても　つめたくない。
북실북실한 털로 몸이n뒤덮여있기 때문에 얼음 위를n굴러도 차갑지 않다.
Son corps est couvert d’une douce fourrure.nElle le protège du sentiment de froid quand il sendéplace en roulant sur la glace.
Sein Körper ist mit flauschigem Fell bedeckt.nDas Fell sorgt dafür, dass es nicht friert, auchnwenn es sich auf dem Eis hin und her rollt.
Tiene un suave pelaje que lo protege del frío cuandonse revuelca por el hielo.
Ha il corpo ricoperto di una morbida pelliccia, chengli permette di rotolare sul ghiaccio senza avvertirenil freddo.
Its body is covered in fluffy fur. The fur keeps itnfrom feeling cold while it is rolling on ice.
フサフサの　体毛でn体が　覆われて　いるのでn氷の　上を　転がっても　冷たくない。
あるくより　ころがる　ほうが　だんぜん　はやい。nしょくじの　じかんは　みんなが　いっせいに　てをnたたいて　よろこぶので　けっこう　うるさいのだ。
걷는 것보다 구르는 편이 단연 빠르다.n식사 시간에는 모두가 일제히 손뼉을n치며 기뻐하기 때문에 꽤 시끄럽다.

Obalie est bien plus rapide quand il roule que quandnil marche. Lorsque des groupes de ce Pokémon mangent,nils applaudissent tous en même temps pour montrernqu’ils sont contents. Leurs repas sont très bruyants.
Seemops kann schneller rollen als laufen. Wenn Gruppenndieses Pokémon zusammen essen, klatschen sie gleichzeitig,num ihre Freude zu zeigen. Deswegen sind ihre Mahlzeitennsehr laut.
Spheal se desplaza por el suelo más rápido rodando quencaminando. Cuando come con otros de su especie, todos senponen a aplaudir para expresar su alegría. Por eso, a vecesnson algo escandalosos.

Spheal si muove molto più velocemente rotolando che nonncamminando. Quando si raggruppano per mangiare, questinPokémon sbattono le zampette per dimostrare la loro gioia.nI loro pasti sono molto rumorosi.
Spheal is much faster rolling than walking to get around.nWhen groups of this Pokémon eat, they all clap at once tonshow their pleasure. Because of this, their mealtimes are noisy.
歩くより　転がる　ほうが　断然　速い。n食事の　時間は　みんなが　一斉に　手をnたたいて　喜ぶので　結構　うるさいのだ。
いつも　ころがって　いどうする　ポケモンだ。nりゅうひょうの　きせつに　こおりの　うえをnころがり　うみを　わたる　すがたを　みかける。
항상 굴러서 이동하는 포켓몬이다.n얼음이 떠다니는 계절에는 얼음 위를n굴러 바다를 건너는 모습을 볼 수 있다.
Obalie voyage toujours en faisant rouler son corps tout rond.nLorsque la saison des neiges arrive, on peut voir ce Pokémonnrouler sur la glace et traverser la mer.
Seemops bewegt sich fort, indem es seinen ballartigen Körpernherumrollt. Wenn Eisschollen auftauchen, kann man diesesnPokémon dabei beobachten, wie es über das Eis rollt undndas Meer überquert.
Spheal se desplaza siempre rodando gracias al cuerponesférico que tiene. Al comenzar la época glacial, es fácil verlenrodando por superficies heladas y atravesando el mar.
Spheal si muove sempre rotolando sul corpo a pallone.nNella stagione del disgelo lo si vede rotolare da una lastrandi ghiaccio all’altra per attraversare il mare.
Spheal always travels by rolling around on its ball-like body.nWhen the season for ice floes arrives, this Pokémon can benseen rolling about on ice and crossing the sea.
いつも　転がって　移動する　ポケモンだ。n流氷の　季節に　氷の　上をn転がり　海を　渡る　姿を　見かける。
